title.narrative: Rural Development: Agricultural Revival Programme in Equateur Province

description.narrative: The overall goal of the programme will be to contribute to enhancing food security and raising rural poor livelihoods. The development objective of the Programme will be to restore and improve the sustainable livelihood of the rural communities.The programme''s specific objectives will be to: (i) restore and improve the agricultural production assets, improve the equitable and sustainable access of farmers to markets and raise the agricultural income; (ii) restore and improve the fishery sector production assets, improve the equitable and sustainable access of fishermen (women) to markets and raise their income; (iii) restore and improve communities access to basic social services. A special focus would be placed on addressing the development constraints of the poorest rural categories and specially widows, pygmies and other vulnerable groups.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Agricultural Revival Programme in Equateur Province

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
